Package server

Class BillboardAdmin

java.lang.Object
server.BillboardAdmin
public class BillboardAdmin
extends java.lang.Object
The BillboardAdmin contains methods which interacts with the server and database when working with the Billboard Table. Methods querying, creation, editing and deletion of billboards from the Billboard table. This class file contains both method that interacts with the server and database, and the SQL queries.

  • Method Details

    • dropBillboardTable

      public static java.lang.String dropBillboardTable() throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      Delete Table: Billboard. This is a generic method which drops the table. This is a method used for testing only.

      This method always returns immediately.

      Returns:
      Returns a String with the message of Billboard Table Dropped
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.sql.SQLException - Throws an exception if there is a database access error or other errors.

    • createBillboardTable

      public static java.lang.String createBillboardTable() throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      Create Table: Billboard. This is a method which will create Billboard Table in the database if it dosent exist. The method will also return a message string if data already exists.

      This method always returns immediately.

      Returns:
      A return string which denotes if a table has been created (Table Created), or the data status within the table (Data Filled, Data Exists).
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.sql.SQLException - Throws an exception if there is a database access error or other errors.

    • createBillboard

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge createBillboard​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String billboard, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.String xmlCode, byte[] pictureData) throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      Stores Database Queries: Billboard. This is a generic method which stores any query sent to the database. This method will update and also create billboards if it dosent exist in the billboard already.

      This method always returns immediately.

      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is used to check if the user are allowed to be interacting with the app. Generated when the user first logins
      billboard - A String which provides Billboard Name to store into database
      creator - A string which notes the user who created the billbaord
      xmlCode - A String which provides xmlCode to store into database
      pictureData - A Byte array which is base64 encoded represenation of the actual picture
      Returns:
      ServerAcknowledge A enum which is used to assist in the GUI actions.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.sql.SQLException - Throws an exception if there is a database access error or other errors.

    • deleteBillboard

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge deleteBillboard​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String billboard, java.lang.String requestor) throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      Stores Database Queries: Billboard. This is a generic method which deletes a billboard stored in database.

      This method always returns immediately.

      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is used to check if the user are allowed to be interacting with the app. Generated when the user first logins
      billboard - A String which provides Billboard Name to delete from database
      requestor - A string which provides the username whom wants to delete data from the database
      Returns:
      ServerAcknowledge A enum which indicates pass/fail status which is used to assist in the GUI actions.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.sql.SQLException - Throws an exception if there is a database access error or other errors.

    • getBillboardInformation

      public static DbBillboard getBillboardInformation​(java.lang.String sessionToken, java.lang.String billboard) throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      Stores Database Queries: Billboard. This is a generic method which edits billboard xmlCode in the database.

      This method always returns immediately.

      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is used to check if the user are allowed to be interacting with the app. Generated when the user first logins
      billboard - A String which provides Billboard Name to store into database
      Returns:
      dbBillboard A DbBillboard Object which contains information on the Name, Creator, XML, Picture data and server status through ServerAcknowledgement
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.sql.SQLException - Throws an exception if there is a database access error or other errors.

    • listBillboard

      public static BillboardList listBillboard​(java.lang.String sessionToken) throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      List all billboard names that are stored in the database as an Array String

      This method always returns immediately.

      Parameters:
      sessionToken - A String which is used to check if the user are allowed to be interacting with the app. Generated when the user first logins
      Returns:
      Returns an BillboardList object which contains an ArrayString Field that contains all the Billboard that is stored in the database.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.sql.SQLException - Throws an exception if there is a database access error or other errors.

    • countFilterBillboardSql

      public static java.lang.String countFilterBillboardSql​(java.lang.String billboardName) throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      Method to check if a billboard from the database
      Parameters:
      billboardName - String of billboard to check if exist in database
      Returns:
      Returns a String if the billboard exists (1) or not (0)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.sql.SQLException - Throws an exception if there is a database access error or other errors.

      Returns:

    • deleteAllBillboard

      public static Server.ServerAcknowledge deleteAllBillboard() throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      Stores Database Queries: Billboard. This is a generic method which deletes all billboards stored into database.

      Returns:
      ServerAcknowledgement which allows the GUI to acknowledge
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
      java.sql.SQLException - Throws an exception if there is a database access error or other errors. This method always returns immediately.
